se.miun.dt142g

Interface Controller


  • public interface Controller
    Controlls witch view to be displayed and the user needs to implement how this is done. Each function represents a view except setSavedTabs witch is used for setting a star at the tab title.
    Since:
    2014-10-19

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setConnectionView()
      If there was some errors when connecting to the dataabse this view is displayed that you have the posibility to reconnect
      void setSavedTab(javax.swing.JComponent tabView, boolean savedState)
      This is not an view but it alters the views (tabView) title text to display a asterix if savedState is true oteherwise just the name.
      void setViewBookings()
      This view displays a table of all the reservations that is done.
      void setViewDishDetail(Dish d, java.awt.event.ActionListener removeEvent)
      This view contains details on a dish.
      void setViewDishes()
      The Dishes view shows a list of all dishes available for the menues
      void setViewDishes(boolean saved)
      This view is called from DishDetail view to give some feedback if there was any changes made to that dish
      void setViewInventory()
      This view displays a list of all ingredients currently known to the system and the amount (port.) for each ingredient in the inventory
      void setViewNewBooking(Booking b)
      This view is used when the user wants to create a new Reservation for a table.
      void setViewUsers()
      This displays a grouplist consisting of user attributes.
      void setViewWebsite()
      The websiteview witch controlls general things on the website like events opening hours and contact information

      • setViewDishes

        void setViewDishes(boolean saved)
        This view is called from DishDetail view to give some feedback if there was any changes made to that dish
        Parameters:
        saved - - The indicator if true then something has changed otherwise false

      • setViewDishDetail

        void setViewDishDetail(Dish d,
                     java.awt.event.ActionListener removeEvent)
        This view contains details on a dish. Like ingredients and price for the dish. You have the posibility to eneter the name of the dish here as well
        Parameters:
        d - - The dish to edit details on
        removeEvent - - An event lister if the user wants to remove the current dish.

      • setViewNewBooking

        void setViewNewBooking(Booking b)
        This view is used when the user wants to create a new Reservation for a table. THis creates a view that the user can alter the reservation details
        Parameters:
        b - - A new booking element reference

      • setViewBookings

        void setViewBookings()
        This view displays a table of all the reservations that is done.

      • setViewInventory

        void setViewInventory()
        This view displays a list of all ingredients currently known to the system and the amount (port.) for each ingredient in the inventory

      • setSavedTab

        void setSavedTab(javax.swing.JComponent tabView,
               boolean savedState)
        This is not an view but it alters the views (tabView) title text to display a asterix if savedState is true oteherwise just the name.
        Parameters:
        tabView - - The top view you want to alter
        savedState - - If false an asterix becomes visible at the right of the text in the title. if true the asterix disapears. The asterix indicates an unsaved state
